title: Pavarotti in London
abstract: Recondita armonia (Tosca, Puccini)--Ah, la paterna mano (Macbeth, Verdi)--La mia letizia infondere (I Lombardi, Verdi)--Quando le sere al placido...L'ara, o l'avello (Luisa Miller, Verdi)--Fra poco a me ricovero (Lucia di Lammermoor, Donizetti)--Lamento di Federico (L'Arlesiana, Cilea)--E lucevan le stelle (Tosca, Puccini)--Una Furtiva Lagrima (L'Elisir d'Amore, Donizetti)--Nessun Dorma (Turandot, Puccini)--Torna A Surriento (G.B. de Curtis/E. de Curtis)
description: The magnificent Luciano Pavarotti performing at his best in a Gala Concert performance at the Royal Albert Hall on 13th April 1982 in the presence of Her Majesty, Queen Elizabeth, the Queen Mother, and featuring the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Kurt Herbert Adler. Recorded live on location.
